channel.title: [Class Suggestions] 10 Classes that should be in ToL
channel.description:
**NOTE:** _These classes aren't official, the Developers still can make tweaks, or changes, to the suggestions._
**Archer** _Blue Dragon Killing_ [details="Summary"]
Night Ability: Crossbow - Shoot somebody and kill them. If you shoot a Blue Dragon member you will take your own life. Not usable until Night Two. (3)
^ _You still shoot them, but if you shoot a Blue Dragon member, the next night you can’t shoot anybody and you will commit suicide. A Heal cannot save you. You cannot shoot the King._
Converted Into..
**Shooter** _Unseen Killing_
Day Ability: Barriered Up - Make Unseen members immune at night. (2)
^ _This will make all the Unseen members, even you, immune at night._
Night Ability 1: Bam Bam! - Shoot somebody and kill them. This will not count as a visit. (2)
Night Ability 2: Shootout - Shoot somebody, and shoot everybody who visits your target. (2)
^ _If anybody visits your target, you will kill everybody including them, besides your unseen members._ [/details]
**Priest** _Blue Dragon Support_ [details="Summary"]
Passive: Unique - This is a unique class.
Night Ability: Resurrection - Choose a Blue Dragon to bring back from the dead back to their regular class. This will be exposed to the court. (1)
^ _After bringing back somebody: “[Name] [#] has been brought back from the dead!”_
Converted Into
Minister Unseen Support
Passive 1: You Know Who We Are - The Unseen Members will show as their real name to the dead Unseen.
^ _The dead Unseen will see the alive Unseen as their regular name. They can talk to the dead Unseen._
Passive 2: Nobody Can See Us - The dead will not see the messages you type.
^ _The dead, besides the dead Unseen members, won’t see the alive Unseen talking._
Day Ability: Medium - Choose to let the Unseen talk to the dead Unseen members. (5)
^ _The dead Unseen can talk to the alive Unseen for that night._ [/details]
**Janitor** _Blue Dragon Investigative_ [details="Summary"]
Night Ability 1: What Killed You - What did the player die by. (3)
Converted Into
**Custodian** _Unseen Support_
Night Ability 1: What’s Your Class? - Clean somebody who the Assassin is killing. This will remove the logs and the class of the person. You will secretly know their class and their logs. (3)
Night Ability 2: What Killed My Unseen?- See what did the Unseen member died by (2) [/details]
**Scientist** _Blue Dragon Investigative_ [details="Summary"]
Day Ability: Scout - Test if somebody gets converted that night. (2)
Night Ability 1: Immunity - Test somebody to see if they are immune or not. (*)
^ _This includes people that was guarded by the King. Includes Alchemist Stone Skinning, So you better watch out, and not just go out outing people out._
Converted Into
**Physicist** _Unseen Investigative_
Day Ability 1: No Scouting - Make the Sheriff’s Scout not see that you converted somebody. (2)
^ _The scouts won’t see if somebody gets converted._
Day Ability 2: No Immunities - Make Assassin Kills go through immunity. (3)
^ _Makes Assassin kills go through immunity._
Night Ability 1: Immunity - Test somebody to see if they are immune or not. (*)
Night Ability 2: Conversion - Test somebody to see if they are available to be converted into the Unseen. (3) [/details]
**Grave Digger** _Neutral Offensive_ [details="Summary"]
Passive: Conversion Immunity - This class cannot be converted.
Night Ability: Dig for Abilities - Use a dead person on anybody or yourself (*)
^ _After using somebody 1 / 2 times (Upto the Developers) the body will ‘rot’ making them unusable to use again_ [/details]
**Witch** _Neutral Offensive_ [details="Summary"]
Passive: Immunity Once - Immunity against an attack once.
Day Ability: Who Visited You - Hide your visits at night. (3)
Night Ability: Control - Control somebody to visit somebody else. (*)
^ _The Witch will know the 1st targets class. The Witch will witch the target’s ability that they were using that night. If Assassin uses 2-For-1, 1 will be Witches target, 1 Assassins._ [/details]
**Ice Mage** _Neutral Killing_ [details="Summary"]
Passive 1: Not Gonna Die - Immune at Night
Passive 2: Conversion Immunity - Cannot be converted at night.
Night Ability 1: Freeze - Ice somebody turning them to ice, killing them. Everybody who visits the target your freezing will be chilled. Not usable until Night Two. (*)
^ _The chill is basically like a Reaper chill._
Night Ability 2: Ice Visitors - Ice everybody who visits you, the night you ice your visitors, killing them. (1) [/details]
**Lookout** _Blue Dragon Investigative_ [details="Summary"]
Night Ability 1: On Watch - Send the visitors of a player to somebody else. You will not see the visitors. (*)
^ _If you send the visitors to the King, it will not say you visited, the other people who visited. You will not see the visitors._
Converted Into
**Stalker** _Unseen Investigative_
Day Ability: Not A Single Visit - Hide all the visits made from the Unseen members. (3)
Night Ability: On Stalk - Send the visitors of a player to somebody else. You will see the visitors too. (*)
^ _Like Lookout, but instead you will know the visitors as well._ [/details]
**Writer** _Blue Dragon Support_ [details="Summary"]
Passive: Unknown Author - The person you send a document to won’t know who the writer was of the document.
Night Ability 1: Document - Send a document with text to another player (*)
^ _A message will appear in the chat: “A document has been sent to you. [message]”_
Night Ability 2: Peak - See if somebody is Blue Dragon or not Blue Dragon. (4)
Converted To
**Forger** _Unseen Support_
Passive 1: Unknown Author - The person you send a document to won’t know who the writer was of the document.
Passive 2: I Forged Your Logs - You will know the logs of a person you forged. The forged logs will be on the side.
Night Ability 1: Document - Send a document with text to another player (*)
^ _A message will appear in the chat: “A document has been sent to you. [message]_
Night Ability 2: Forge - Forge a player replacing their logs will something else. (3)
^ _The real logs of the forged person will be located on the side._
Night Ability 3: Conversion - See a person’s converted class type. (3) [/details]
**Pyromaniac** _Neutral Killer_ [details="Summary"]
Passive 1: Immunity - Immune at Night.
^ _Cannot be killed at night._
Passive 2: Conversion Immunity - Cannot be converted.
^ _Cannot be converted at night._
Passive 3: Mass Ignite - You automatically ignite everybody after everybody is doused.
Passive 4: I’m not Doused - It will not tell the player that they are doused.
^ _It won’t tell the target that they are doused._
Night Ability: Douse In Gas - Douse somebody in gas, and ignite everybody after everybody is doused. (*)
^ _After everybody is doused it will say: “You left the kingdom and watched the kingdom burn.” After dousing somebody, you cannot douse the same person on accident. King Guards don’t help the douse but if a Knight is guarding somebody and you douse them, you will still die,, and the ignite goes through immunity._ [/details]

item.title: [Class Suggestions] 10 Classes that should be in ToL
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Knight: We already have Knight. This is a ToS vigilante. As for converted form, Unseen Killing is a bad idea besides Assassin or a neutral convert.

Priest: ToS Retributionist. We already had this, but it was removed. Besides reviving is a bad idea. Also the converted abilities are weird and random.

Scientist is a limited use Sheriff who can find NKs. We already have Sheriff.

Gravedigger I think is okay. Witch is ToS witch.

Lookout is a Court Wizard without barrier, not an investigative.

Pyromaniac is ToS arsonist.

Most of this stuff is copying ToS.
